channel.title: Utah on Trip Reports
channel.description: Recent content in Utah on Trip Reports

item.title: Trip Journal: Little Cottonwood Canyon
item.description: This is a journal of climbs and activities I enjoyed from May 1st-7th, 2022, climbing near Sandy, Utah in the Little and Big Cottonwood Canyons. Little Cottonwood Canyon has beautiful white granite, while adjacent Big Cottonwood Canyon has a completely different rock type. I’d met a climber named Jesse at Strange Loop 2021, and he was going to be in Salt Lake City for PyCon at the end of April 2022.
